name: Strength

name: No pain No gain
description: At its heart, strength training is based on functional movements — lifting, pushing, pulling — in order to build muscle and coordination needed for everyday activities

name: Feeling Good
description: You don’t get better during workouts; you get better in between,” says Pire. “You should give yourself a day in between strength training.

name: Hack of a Body
description: If you knew that a certain type of exercise could benefit your heart, improve balance! Get started.

name: Build perfect body
description: This benefit is the obvious one, but it shouldn’t be overlooked. “Muscle strength is crucial in making it easier to do the things you need to do on a day-to-day basic.

name: Power Gym
description: At around age 30 we start losing as much as 3 to 5 percent of lean muscle mass per decade thanks to aging, notes Harvard Health Publishing.
